ironborn.name: Ironborn
ironborn.ancestralMemory: The Ironborn remember the First Forge, deep in the Ashpeak mountains, where their ancestors tamed fire and steel.

crownlanders.name: Crownlanders
crownlanders.proverb: "A crown is earned at the table, not the battlefield."
crownlanders.ancestralMemory: The Crownlanders trace their line to the River Council, where seven chieftains broke bread and swore the First Compact.

shieldfolk.name: Shieldfolk
shieldfolk.ancestralMemory: The Shieldfolk were born from the Wardens who stood against the Shadow Tide, holding the passes when all seemed lost.

mosswalkers.name: Mosswalkers
mosswalkers.proverb: "The forest speaks to those who learn to be still."
mosswalkers.ancestralMemory: The Mosswalkers believe they were the first to hear the Heartwood sing ‚Äî the deep vibration of the oldest tree in creation.

canopiers.name: Canopiers
canopiers.proverb: "Those who fear falling never learn to fly."
canopiers.ancestralMemory: The Canopiers say their first mother climbed the World-Tree and never came down, building the first sky-village among its branches.

rootkeepers.name: Rootkeepers
rootkeepers.proverb: "Every oak was once an acorn with the courage to grow."
rootkeepers.ancestralMemory: The Rootkeepers guard the Seed Vaults ‚Äî ancient caches of every plant that ever lived, hidden in root caverns.

windrunners.name: Windrunners
windrunners.proverb: "A Windrunner tied down is a Windrunner already dead."
windrunners.ancestralMemory: They say the first Windrunner caught the tail of a cyclone and rode it across the steppe, mapping every horizon.

sandshapers.name: Sandshapers
sandshapers.proverb: "The desert gives nothing freely ‚Äî and teaches everything."
sandshapers.ancestralMemory: The Sandshapers remember the Year of Glass, when lightning struck the great dunes and their ancestors forged the first desert-glass mirrors.

bonecarvers.name: Bonecarvers
bonecarvers.proverb: "Honor the beast, and its spirit will run with you forever."
bonecarvers.ancestralMemory: The Bonecarvers carry the Great Tusk ‚Äî a mammoth bone inscribed with the names of every tribe elder for a thousand years.

sunweavers.name: Sunweavers
sunweavers.proverb: "Every dawn is proof that darkness cannot last."
sunweavers.ancestralMemory: The Sunweavers tell of a time when the sun died for three days, and their ancestor wove a cloth of pure light to call it back.

ashpilgrims.name: Ashpilgrims
ashpilgrims.ancestralMemory: The Ashpilgrims were born when a volcano buried their village. The survivors walked through the ash for forty days and emerged enlightened.

starcallers.name: Starcallers
starcallers.proverb: "We are all stardust, remembering where we came from."
starcallers.ancestralMemory: The Starcallers claim their founder once climbed a tower so high she touched the stars and brought back a fragment of cosmic truth.

tidecallers.name: Tidecallers
tidecallers.proverb: "The tide waits for no one, but rewards those who know its rhythm."
tidecallers.ancestralMemory: The Tidecallers built the first sea-wall ‚Äî a living barrier of coral and stone that protected their village from the Great Tsunami.

deepdivers.name: Deepdivers
deepdivers.proverb: "The greatest treasures are found where others fear to go."
deepdivers.ancestralMemory: The Deepdivers discovered the Sunken City ‚Äî an ancient civilization beneath the waves ‚Äî and traded its secrets for generations.

sailweavers.name: Sailweavers
sailweavers.proverb: "A good ship and a fair wind ‚Äî what more could the heart desire?"
sailweavers.ancestralMemory: The Sailweavers built the Eternal Fleet ‚Äî ships so masterfully crafted that some still sail, crewed by the descendants of their original builders.

evolutionStages.name: Nomadic Band
evolutionStages.description: Small kinship groups wandering the land

evolutionStages.name: Tribal Camp
evolutionStages.description: Seasonal camps where tribes gather for trade and marriage

evolutionStages.name: Chiefdom
evolutionStages.description: A powerful chief unites several bands under one rule

evolutionStages.name: Village
evolutionStages.description: Settled communities with shared governance and craft specialization

evolutionStages.name: Town
evolutionStages.description: A thriving hub where multiple peoples have intermingled for generations

evolutionStages.name: City
evolutionStages.description: A great city where diverse subcultures form distinct quarters and guilds

evolutionStages.name: Metropolis
evolutionStages.description: A cosmopolitan center where cultures fuse into something new

FESTIVAL.name: Joint Festival
FESTIVAL.description: Celebrating together builds bonds across cultural lines

SHARED_DEFENSE.name: Shared Defense
SHARED_DEFENSE.description: Standing together against a common threat forges deep unity

RIVALRY.name: Cultural Rivalry
RIVALRY.description: Old grudges and competing traditions cause friction

CUISINE_FUSION.name: Cuisine Fusion
CUISINE_FUSION.description: Blending culinary traditions creates beloved new dishes

ART_EXCHANGE.name: Artistic Exchange
ART_EXCHANGE.description: Artists from different traditions inspire each other
